snippet: A two-week assembly of bishops is expected to take up issues like divorce and remarrying and could lead to a revision of some church positions.
abstract: Pope Francis urges participants in synod of Roman Catholic bishops to speak openly and clearly, without fear of censure, and calls on them to listen to each other with humility; statement sets tone for two-week meeting, which will chart church's course regarding family life in contemporary society.
lead_paragraph: A two-week assembly of bishops is expected to take up issues like divorce and remarrying and could lead to a revision of some church positions.

headline.main: Pope Francis Calls for Candor at Meeting on Family Issues
headline.print_headline: Francis Calls for Candor at Meeting on Family
